alert.note: Alert for St. Charles; Upper Jefferson (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 3:25PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central St. Charles and northwestern Jefferson Parishes through 400 PM CDT... At 325 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Luling, or near Hahnville, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hahnville, Metairie, Jefferson, Harahan, Norco, Luling, River Ridge, Boutte, Ama, Destrehan, Waggaman, New Sarpy, St. Rose, Elmwood, Paradis, Bayou Gauche and New Orleans Armstrong Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 218 and 221. Interstate 310 between mile markers 1 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
